A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I just can’t like this movie. Way to many plot holes and utter BS. I really hope JJ can pull off a big save on episode 9 because otherwise this franchise risks losing a large portion of its fan base. Also Disney needs to rethink it’s choice to let Rian Johnson helm the next trilogy. I personally think R.J. ruined episode 8 and I’m skeptical on whether or not it can be fixed!
